content: अंबालिका {@--1@} A mother; good woman (as a term of respect or endearment.) {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a plant (<ab>Mar.</ab> अंबाडा). {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of the youngest daughter of Kāśīrāja, wife of Vichitra-Vīrya. She became the mother of Pāṇḍu by Vyāsa who was invoked by Satyavatī to beget a son to Vicitra-Vīrya who had died without issue.
